data.comment: The match is underway in Harrison.
New York to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for DC United at Red Bull Arena.
DC United are whistled for offside.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
In the minute 3, Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
Daniel Royer gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York.
Corner awarded to New York.
In the minute 4, In Harrison New York attack through Kaku. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Harrison.
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for New York in the half of DC United.
New York advance rapidly upfield but Nima Saghafi blows for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in New York.
New York's Omir Fernandez is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for New York in the half of DC United.
In the minute 8, Frederic Brillant (DC United) has received a yellow card from Nima Saghafi.
New York have a dangerous throw-in.
Kaku (New York) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to DC United.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 14, Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
DC United have a goal kick.
Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
Nima Saghafi signals a New York throw-in in DC United's half.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
In the minute 18, Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
Free kick for New York in their own half.
Nima Saghafi signals a New York throw-in in DC United's half.
In the minute 21, New York to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
DC United needs to be cautious. New York have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for DC United at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Harrison New York drive forward through Tom Barlow. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 27, Tom Barlow (New York) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Throw-in DC United.
Goal kick for DC United at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 29, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York surge into the attack at Red Bull Arena but Tom Barlow’s header is off-target.
Nima Saghafi awards DC United a goal kick.
In the minute 32, DC United pushes forward through Ola Kamara, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to DC United.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
In the minute 35, Tom Barlow of New York smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
New York have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 37, Important block from the DC United defence as Daniel Royer fires in a strike for New York.
New York have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Throw-in high up the field for New York in Harrison.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for New York in the half of DC United.
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Harrison.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
DC United are coming forward and Mohammed Abu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Nima Saghafi awards New York a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Harrison.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 46, Can DC United capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York's half?
Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in New York.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for New York at Red Bull Arena.
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for New York at Red Bull Arena.
In Harrison a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nima Saghafi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Free kick New York.
At Red Bull Arena, Mohammed Abu has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ola Kamara (DC United) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to DC United.
Throw-in for New York at Red Bull Arena.
New York have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
In the minute 55, New York's Sean Davis misses with an attempt on goal.
DC United have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to New York.
In the minute 57, DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
DC United drives forward and Ola Kamara gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Free kick in a good position for New York!
Nima Saghafi signals a New York throw-in in DC United's half.
In Harrison a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to New York.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
DC United to take a throw-in in New York territory.
In the minute 64, Throw-in New York.
New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ben Mines is on a sub for Omir Fernandez for New York.
In the minute 66, Chris Armas is making the team's second substitution at Red Bull Arena with Mathias Jorgensen replacing Tom Barlow.
Aaron Long is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 67, Nima Saghafi awards the away team a throw-in.
Amro Tarek (New York) has replaced the possibly injured Aaron Long at Red Bull Arena.
Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Sean Davis for New York who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 71, Sean Davis (New York) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Cristian Casseres Jr.
Oniel Fisher is replacing Kevin Paredes for the away team.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 73, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nima Saghafi signals a throw-in for New York, close to DC United's area.
DC United have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in DC United.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Harrison to check on Mohammed Abu, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in for DC United at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 78, The away team has substituted Mohammed Abu with Moses Nyeman. Ben Olsen is thus making his second change.
In the minute 79, DC United will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from New York.
The home team have replaced Daniel Royer with Florian Valot. This is the fifth substitution made today by Chris Armas.
New York's Jason Pendant breaks free at Red Bull Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Nima Saghafi awards DC United a goal kick.
In the minute 81, New York have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
Nima Saghafi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to New York.
Free kick New York.
New York have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
In the minute 85, Mathias Jorgensen (New York) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
Throw-in for DC United in the half of New York.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to New York.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for DC United in the half of New York.
Amro Tarek (New York) has received a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick New York.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
DC United to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Harrison.
Corner awarded to New York.
New York have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to New York.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
Goal kick for New York at Red Bull Arena.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Nima Saghafi signals a New York throw-in in DC United's half.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
DC United make their third substitution with Erik Sorga replacing Ola Kamara.
Griffin Yow is replacing Ulises Segura for DC United at Red Bull Arena.
Goal! Erik Sorga gives DC United a 0-1 lead in Harrison.
